colorhex 0.1.01

Get most popular palettes

Source: R/palette.R
get_popular_palettes.Rd

Retrieve the palettes most users have favourited from www.color-hex.com

get_popular_palettes()

Value

data.frame with name, id and colours

Examples

get_popular_palettes()
